definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]

sentences.english: Gold and white face has black Arabic numerals.
sentences.chinese: 黃金和白臉黑色阿拉伯語或羅馬數字。

sentences.english: Most of the calls have come from inside Egypt and most are in Arabic.
sentences.chinese: 大部分的電話來自埃及國內，並且大部分是阿拉伯語。

sentences.english: For example, the reading order of Arabic and Indic scripts is bidirectional.
sentences.chinese: 例如，阿拉伯語和印度語文字的閱讀順序就是雙向的。

sentences.english: Mexican Luoge in northwest Africa, the official language is Arabic.
sentences.chinese: 墨洛哥位於非洲西北部，官方語言爲阿拉伯語。

sentences.english: The word lira is the Arabic translation of pound.
sentences.chinese: 里拉是阿拉伯語中磅的翻譯。

sentences.english: It refers to its Arabic name – Masjid.

sentences.chinese: 我們知道你懂阿拉伯語。

sentences.english: I studied Arabic at the time, and I developed many friends in Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 那時我主攻阿拉伯語，在埃及結識了許多朋友。

sentences.english: The Qur'an was able to hold the Arabic language in thrall from the moment it was revealed.
sentences.chinese: 古蘭從被降示那一刻起便能保護阿拉伯語免遭奴役。

sentences.english: This course examines traditional performances of the Arabic-speaking populations of the Middle East and North Africa.
sentences.chinese: 此課程檢視在中東與北美的阿拉伯語族羣之傳統展演。

sentences.english: Egypt is one of the Arabic-speaking countries in Africa.
sentences.chinese: 埃及是非洲講阿拉伯語的國家之一。

sentences.english: Ripsnorter, so according to the experts the solution is for Europeans to learn arabic.
sentences.chinese: 所以專家們的解決辦法是讓歐洲人去學阿拉伯語。

sentences.english: For the first time it is interpreted simultaneously in Arabic.
sentences.chinese: 第一次阿拉伯語同聲傳譯。

sentences.english: One of them was a fluent Arabic and Kurdish speaker; [she] was terrific.
sentences.chinese: 其中一個可以講流利的阿拉伯語和庫爾德語，非常好。

sentences.english: Instead, the Egyptian pronunciation of his name is the norm for English transliteration.
sentences.chinese: 但是埃及阿拉伯語的讀音則更接近於英語的音譯。

sentences.english: Islamism and the Arabic in Western Asia are the primary unification factors.
sentences.chinese: 伊斯蘭教和阿拉伯語是西亞地區統一的主要特徵。

definition: radical of a compound word (in European language)
to write characters in simplified form/the simplified form of a character/to abbreviate (a word or expression)/to write in simple language
When you enter a village, follow the local customs (idiom); do as the natives do/When in Rome, do as the Romans do
